about_the_game:
Increase your Ship’s cargo storage limit to the maximum upgrade of 2500 and obtain 500 additional Metal, Wood, Cloth, Stone and Tobacco resources.

Important: You need to progress in the story to see the full effect of this DLC.
detailed_description:
Increase your Ship’s cargo storage limit to the maximum upgrade of 2500 and obtain 500 additional Metal, Wood, Cloth, Stone and Tobacco resources.

Important: You need to progress in the story to see the full effect of this DLC.
